name: Alex's Rock
description:
Looking for something new?

Alex's Rock for you! New and unique one touch gameplay will create you chalenge. Pick bonuses and dodge enemies. Try to beat records
Earn skins and themes to create your own story. Try your luck!

Go and play it)

Features:
-Fully new experience
-5 unique themes and maps (Sesame street, star wars, police, minimalistic and smartphones)
-Lucky bonuses
-No annoying advertisement
